mapper.update:
update wall_transform_info
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_txt_url = #{inTxtUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_png_url = #{inPngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_txt_url = #{outTxtUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
out_png_url = #{outPngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
transform_time = #{transformTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
txt_file_name = #{txtFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
png_file_name = #{pngFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prj_name = #{prjName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id,in_txt_url,in_png_url,out_txt_url,out_png_url,upload_time,prj_name,txt_file_name,png_file_name FROM wall_transform_info WHERE user_name = #{userName} ORDER BY upload_time DESC
SELECT txt_file_name,png_file_name from wall_transform_info where user_name = #{username} and prj_name = #{prjname}
